statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE cost_saving_initiative = TRUE;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE energy_usage > 100 AND cost_saving_initiative = TRUE;
DELETE FROM FacilityDetails WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 1000 AND facility_id = 1;
DELETE FROM FacilityDetails WHERE location = 'New York' AND manager_id = 5;
DELETE FROM cost_saving_table WHERE facility_id = 2022 AND saving_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM energy_meters WHERE facility_id = 2 AND meter_type = 'Electric';
DELETE FROM facility_energy_costs WHERE facility_id = 1 AND year = 2020;
DELETE FROM energy_readings WHERE meter_id = 1002 AND reading_time < '2022-01-01';
